entries.name: malloc(types, func = nil)
entries.desc: Allocates a C struct with the types provided.

entries.name: new(addr, types, func = nil)
entries.desc: Wraps the C pointer addr as a C struct with the given types.

entries.name: size(types)
entries.desc: Returns the offset for the packed sizes for the given types.

entries.name: []=(name, val)
entries.desc: Set struct member name, to value val

entries.name: assign_names(members)
entries.desc: Set the names of the members in this C struct

entries.name: set_ctypes(types)
entries.desc: Calculates the offsets and sizes for the given types in the struct.
